subject: RE: [junit] Could not start test case: java.lang.ClassCastException: org.apache.xerces.parse
msgSnippet: The answer to this is in the JUnit FAQ. http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#runners_1 Scott Stirling
messageBody:
The answer to this is in the JUnit FAQ.

http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#runners_1

Scott Stirling

> -----Original Message-----
> From: xinhong_luo [mailto:xinhong.luo@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 31, 2002 4:47 PM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [junit] Could not start test case:
> java.lang.ClassCastException: org.apache.xerces.parse
>
>
> Hi,
> I am using junit (version 3.7, and apache's xerces xml parser) to do
> unit test for my class which is a xml parser with dom. I can run the
> program through the main method with the class, but it fail if I run
> from junit test. the message is:
>
> Could not start test case: java.lang.ClassCastException:
> org.apache.xerces.parsers.StandardParserConfiguration
>
> at the line:
> DOMParser parser = new DOMParser();
>
>
> Please help.
